text: Reforms required of Ant Group by Chinese regulators set an example for the fintech sector, the state-backed Economic Daily said in a commentary on Monday.The central bank has called on the affiliate of Alibaba Group Holding Ltd (9988.HK) to restructure as a financial holding company.Ant has assembled a "comprehensive and feasible restructuring plan" at the urging of financial regulators, the People's Bank of China said.  read more
